arkanoid.capsule

Class Capsule

  • java.lang.Object
    • atariCore.BaseObject
      • arkanoid.capsule.Capsule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Acid, Break, Catch, Disrupt, Expand, Fast, Fire, Laser, Life, Score, Shrink, Slow, Vaus

    public abstract class Capsule
extends BaseObject
    Holds common capsule properties.

      • Capsule

        public Capsule(int x,
               int y,
               int life,
               java.awt.Image image)
        Parameterised constructor used to set x, y coordinates, life and capsule's image.
        Parameters:
        x - capsule's x coordinate.
        y - capsule's y coordinate.
        life - capsule's effect life time span.
        image - capsule's image.

    • Method Detail

      • effect

        public abstract void effect(Paddle p)
        Applies given capsule effect to the current paddle.
        Parameters:
        p - paddle on which the capsule takes effect.

      • removeEffect

        public void removeEffect(Paddle p)
        Removes effect from the paddle.
        Parameters:
        p - paddle on which the capsule effect stops.
